title: Marriyum wishes great success to Pakistani films releasing on Eid
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 09 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb on Saturday wished great success to the Pakistani films releasing on the occasion of Eid-ul-Azha.
“I am confident the unprecedented incentives announced by the government in Budget 2023 for Pakistan’s film industry will help film producers take the industry to new heights and enable the revival of screen tourism in Pakistan,” the minister tweeted.
Wishing great success to Pakistani films releasing this Eid. I’m confident the unprecedented incentives announced by the govt in Budget 2023 for Pakistan’s film industry will help film producers take the industry to new heights & enable the revival of screen tourism in Pakistan
— Marriyum Aurangzeb (@Marriyum_A) July 9, 2022
